name: Daniel
body:
Hi there, 
 
You might already know how important web design is for business. If your site is not done well, you might be losing on a lot of customers, who leave your site as soon as they arrive. 
 
Well, we have a unique offer you: let us redesign your website absolutely free when you move your monthly digital marketing programs* to New Light Digital. Basically let us take over your marketing, and act like your own marketing department, and you will get a beautiful custom new website for free. 
 
This is risk free -- we have high expertise in both web design as well as digital marketing, with over 10 years of experience in both. 
 
I am also including a valuable PDF guide for you: use this 25 Point Website Usability Checklist to see if your website meets the minimum user experience requirements to rank on Google. If you are coming short, or not sure, this offer might be perfect for you. Download free of charge here: https://bit.ly/3iwLQ6x 
 
*Note that for this offer to apply, your monthly digital marketing budget should be no less than $1,000 per month. 
 
Thanks, 
Daniel Todercan 
Owner 
New Light Digital
